page.title: 14Leisure and recreation
page.content: The worst problem in port isaac is transport,becase there is hardly any public transport,like trains or bus's and every thing is so for away.The results of a questionaire sampling people of different ages showed that all ages seem to watch the telivision and listen to the radio.The younger ones like to listen to the radio,and the older ones did quite a lot of walking.Most people would like a cinema and swimming pool, an ice skating rink and roller stating rink They also would like a tennis court.Although there are not many activities provided there is the swimming,fishing,sailing and the nice country walking,and so the younger ones can find plenty to do in the summer.
